title: Challenger Nidalee Feedback --> Visual bug ^.=.^

embed.description: League of Legends Challenger Nidalee Skin Spotlight. Shows off Animations and Ability Effects of Nidalee on their Challenger Skin in this Spotlight. All footage was taken in game.

body:
Dear Riot,

I have found a visual bug with the new Challenger Nidalee skin.
After I purchased the skin, I played with it in a costum game to see how it looks.
Well, first I pressed the recall button, to see what it was like, but after that, I pressed her emotes.
And there it is, the Ctrl+2 or /taunt; /t Visual bug.
After Nidalee says: 'Here, mousy mousy mousy.' She breaks her spear and then this happens:  

- http://prntscr.com/9qgzn6 - Front of Skin + Character Inking on
- http://prntscr.com/9qh40o - Side of Skin + Character Inking on
- http://prntscr.com/9qh4fs - Front of Skin + Character Inking off + Anti-Aliasing 
- http://prntscr.com/9qh4o9 - Side of Skin + Character Inking off + Anti-Aliasing 

Her spear isn't actually broken, the textures stay combined together.
Is this a bug?
I really want this bug to be fixed. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 

In the Skin Spotlight of Challenger Nidalee on youtube, you can see this visual bug too.
I put the link in here. Look at 0:53 

Greetings, 
LoLMasterWayne

replies.body:
No problem :D
I just wanted to report this, because there were no reports on boards about this bug. 
The bug was annoying me, so that's why I posted this.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Thanks for the awesome bug report! 

We're aware of this particular issue and are working on a fix! This was a weighting issue with the new spear.
